author: AP
title: Antetokounmpo, Bucks searching for ways to stay sharp at home
description: Giannis Antetokounmpo is spending much of his time during the coronavirus-imposed hiatus working out, helping care for his newborn son and playing video games.
content:
MILWAUKEE Giannis Antetokounmpo is spending much of his time during the coronavirus-imposed hiatus working out, helping care for his newborn son and playing occasional video games.
What the reigning MVP isnt doing very often is shooting baskets since the NBA… [+1690 chars]
